item.description:
May swaps:
* Snail mail (postcards, stamps, what have you)
* Make cards using alcohol inks (demonstrated at April workshop)
* Special anniversary swap: Fours. 

Participate in any, all or none!

May Activity:  This month Patty will be leading us in making some May flowers using stamps.  Please bring some script, letter and number stamps, buttons, brads and distress ink pads if you have any. We will have materials to share.  We will also be using white cardstock, and glue sticks. Bring extras and make a whole bouquet!
item.how_to_find_us: Details are in the e-mails sent to all who RSVP "yes;" also posted on Message Board
item.why: it's always fun and creative and revitalizing and we learn a lot and talk a lot and laugh a lot and eat a lot.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ May Meetup
